questions.question: Do you often interrupt others while they are speaking?
questions.explanation: Frequently interrupting others while they are speaking can be seen as annoying, as it can disrupt the flow of conversation and prevent others from expressing their thoughts.

questions.question: How often do you talk loudly in public spaces?
options: Never, I prefer to speak softly
questions.explanation: Talking loudly in public spaces can be perceived as annoying, as it can disrupt the peace and privacy of others around you.

questions.question: Do you frequently complain about minor inconveniences?
options: No, I try to stay positive
questions.explanation: Frequently complaining about minor inconveniences can be annoying to others, as it can create a negative atmosphere and focus on trivial issues.

questions.question: How often do you use your phone in social settings?
options: Constantly, I can't stay away from my phone
Sometimes, when I receive important messages
Rarely, I try to be present in the moment
Never, I keep my phone away
questions.answer: Constantly, I can't stay away from my phone
questions.explanation: Using your phone constantly in social settings can be seen as annoying, as it can give the impression that you are disinterested or not fully engaged in the conversation.

questions.question: How often do you talk over people in group discussions?
options: Always, I want to be heard
Never, I wait for my turn to speak
questions.answer: Always, I want to be heard
questions.explanation: Consistently talking over people in group discussions can be annoying, as it can prevent others from expressing their opinions and disrupt the flow of conversation.

questions.question: Do you frequently forget personal boundaries and invade others' personal space?
options: Yes, I'm not aware of personal space
No, I'm very conscious of personal space
questions.answer: Yes, I'm not aware of personal space
questions.explanation: Frequently invading others' personal space can be annoying, as it can make others uncomfortable and infringe upon their boundaries.

questions.question: How often do you dominate conversations and make everything about yourself?
options: Always, I love talking about myself
Rarely, I try to give others the spotlight
questions.answer: Always, I love talking about myself
questions.explanation: Consistently dominating conversations and making everything about yourself can be seen as annoying, as it can prevent others from sharing their thoughts and experiences.

questions.question: How often do you arrive late to appointments or events?
options: Rarely, I try to be punctual
questions.explanation: Consistently arriving late to appointments or events can be annoying to others, as it shows a lack of respect for their time and disrupts schedules.

questions.question: How often do you engage in excessive self-promotion or bragging?
options: Always, I want everyone to know my achievements
Never, I don't like to boast
questions.answer: Always, I want everyone to know my achievements
questions.explanation: Frequently engaging in excessive self-promotion or bragging can be seen as annoying, as it can come across as boastful and self-centered.

questions.question: Do you often forget to listen and interrupt others' stories with your own?
options: Yes, I can't help but share my own stories
Rarely, I prefer to listen to others
No, I give full attention to others
questions.answer: Yes, I can't help but share my own stories
questions.explanation: Frequently interrupting others' stories with your own can be annoying, as it can shift the focus away from them and make them feel unheard.
